price: 44. Jie tarė: „Sumaišyti klaidinti sapnai ir mes nesame įgudę sapnų aiškinime.“
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَضۡغَٰثُ أَحۡلَٰمٖۖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَأۡوِيلِ ٱلۡأَحۡلَٰمِ بِعَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū aḍghāthu aḥlāmin wamā naḥnu bitawīli al-aḥlāmi biʿālimīna
